body_html:
I posted an update on #6984 as well:
#6984 (comment)

In summary, I think you're looking for tf.contrib.rnn.static_rnn. Let us know if that is it.

That said, if possible, please do use the latest release if possible. Code at head is subject to change and will be hard to constantly keep up with. See my comment in the other issue.
body_text:
I posted an update on #6984  as well:
#6984 (comment)
In summary, I think you're looking for tf.contrib.rnn.static_rnn. Let us know if that is it.
That said, if possible, please do use the latest release if possible. Code at head is subject to change and will be hard to constantly keep up with. See my comment in the other issue.
body:
I posted an update on #6984  as well:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/6984#issuecomment-274183963

In summary, I think you're looking for `tf.contrib.rnn.static_rnn`. Let us know if that is it.

That said, if possible, please do use the latest release if possible. Code at head is subject to change and will be hard to constantly keep up with. See my comment in the other issue.
